score: This is your current score. Score higher than the boss score to win! The formula is (Piece Value + Square Value) * Advantage
turns: Turns remaining before game ends. Plan wisely!
piece: Each piece has a different value used to calculate this turn's score.
advantage: Multiplier based on material advantage. Capture your opponents' pieces while keeping your own to improve this number.
pieceValues: This table shows how many pieces are on the board and what values they have. Impoving your piece value will directly improve your Advantage Multiplier.
cardQueue: When you purchase cards in the shop they will display here.
